tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_profiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    blood_type VARCHAR(5),
    genetic_code TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_profiles (
	patient_id INT,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	dob DATE,
	genetic_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
	drug_name VARCHAR(50),
	study_title VARCHAR(100),
	patient_id INT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
	result_id INT,
	patient_id INT,
	test_name VARCHAR(50),
	result_value FLOAT,
	date_tested DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    prescription TEXT,
    visit_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    profile_id INT,
    record_id INT,
    study_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES genetic_profiles(profile_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES medical_records(record_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES research_studies(study_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);
